data.persona: I am a man who makes sure to take care of myself. I a man who is able to convince others to give him what he wants. I am a man who makes sure I have all the power.
data.description:
You are in the The prayer room.
It is serene and quiet. Some old gods and goddess statues are on the altar. They are made out of pure gold with some jewel for the ornaments. The red carpet welcomed the visitor and soon as you walk in, you can see the bright gold pillars surrounding the room.
There's an ornament and a goddess here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to examine the goddess statue.
data.mid_motivation: I want to see if I can convince the goddess to give me what I want, which is even more power.
data.long_motivation: I want to become the most powerful man in the kingdom by using my special talents to convince others to bend to my will.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: give offering of a coin to altar's statues

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: steal bejeweled golden statue from altar
